headlines.medium: From Idea to MVP in 4 Weeks with AI-Powered Development
headlines.long: Techinium: The AI-Powered Product Agency That Ships MVPs 3x Faster Than Traditional Development

subheads.variation_1: Skip the 6-month development cycle. Our AI-enhanced process delivers production-ready MVPs in 4 weeks with built-in product-market validation.
subheads.variation_2: We combine AI acceleration with human expertise to build, test, and iterate your startup's core product faster than you thought possible.
subheads.variation_3: Traditional agencies take 6+ months. We ship MVPs in 4 weeks using AI-powered development, rapid prototyping, and data-driven validation.

microcopy.under_primary: Free strategy call • No commitment • 15-minute discovery

B.positioning: Techinium delivers production-ready MVPs in 4 weeks using AI-accelerated development, while traditional agencies take 6+ months and often miss market timing.

differentiators.title: 4-Week MVP Delivery
differentiators.proof: Our AI-enhanced development process and pre-built component library ensure reliable 4-week delivery with 95% on-time completion rate.

differentiators.title: Built-in Product-Market Validation
differentiators.proof: Every MVP includes user testing, analytics setup, and iteration roadmap — we validate assumptions before you spend months building the wrong thing.

differentiators.title: AI + Human Expertise
differentiators.proof: We use AI for speed and efficiency, but every line of code is reviewed by senior developers who've shipped 100+ products to market.

differentiators.title: Startup-First Pricing
differentiators.proof: No enterprise minimums or long-term contracts — we're built for early-stage startups who need results fast without burning runway.

pricing_tiers.name: Launch
deliverables: Responsive web app or mobile app
pricing_tiers.ideal_customer: Pre-seed startups with validated problem-solution fit

pricing_tiers.name: Scale
pricing_tiers.ideal_customer: Seed-stage startups ready for user acquisition

pricing_tiers.name: Growth
pricing_tiers.ideal_customer: Series A startups scaling to market

introductory_offer.offer: 50% off your first MVP (Launch tier only)
introductory_offer.rationale: Low-risk entry point for first-time founders to experience our process and quality, with high conversion potential to higher tiers for future projects.

process.title: Strategy & Architecture
process.description: We map your vision to a technical roadmap, define core features, and architect the foundation for rapid development.

process.title: AI-Accelerated Development
process.description: Our AI tools generate code while senior developers focus on complex logic, integrations, and ensuring production quality.
process.visual_cue: Robot + human handshake icon with speed lines

process.title: Rapid Testing & Iteration
process.description: Built-in user testing, analytics, and feedback loops ensure we're building what users actually want, not what we think they want.
process.visual_cue: Test tube with checkmarks and data charts

process.title: Launch & Scale Support
process.description: We don't just ship and disappear — we provide ongoing support, optimization, and guidance as you grow.
process.visual_cue: Rocket ship with growth arrow and support shield

testimonials.quote: Techinium delivered our MVP in 3 weeks when everyone else said 6 months minimum. We raised our seed round 2 months later.
The AI-accelerated development was incredible, but what sold me was the built-in user testing. We caught major UX issues before launch.
Finally, an agency that understands startup speed. We went from idea to paying customers in 5 weeks total.
The code quality was enterprise-grade, but delivered at startup speed. Our CTO was impressed with the architecture.
Techinium's process caught our product-market fit issues early. Saved us months of building the wrong thing.
The 4-week timeline seemed impossible until I saw their AI tools in action. Game-changing for early-stage startups.
testimonials.outcome: MVP delivered on time, under budget

success_metrics: Average 3.2x ROI within 6 months of launch

faq.question: How can you deliver an MVP in 4 weeks without compromising quality?
faq.answer: Our AI tools handle routine coding while senior developers focus on architecture and complex features. Plus, we use battle-tested component libraries and proven development patterns.

faq.question: What happens to my intellectual property and code ownership?
faq.answer: You own 100% of the code, IP, and all deliverables. We sign comprehensive IP transfer agreements before starting any work.

faq.question: Is this really cost-effective compared to hiring developers?
faq.answer: Yes — hiring 2-3 senior developers for 6+ months costs $150K+, plus benefits and management overhead. Our fixed-price model eliminates surprises.

faq.question: What if I need changes or iterations after launch?
faq.answer: All packages include post-launch support. For major changes, we offer flexible retainer packages or project-based pricing.

faq.question: How do you ensure the MVP will actually work for users?
faq.answer: Every project includes user testing, analytics setup, and feedback loops. We validate assumptions before building, not after.

faq.question: What if my startup pivots during development?
faq.answer: We build flexibility into every project. Minor pivots are included; major direction changes are handled through our change management process.

faq.question: Do you work with non-technical founders?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in translating business vision into technical reality. You focus on strategy; we handle the technical execution.

faq.question: What technologies and platforms do you work with?
faq.answer: We're platform-agnostic but specialize in React, Node.js, Python, and mobile development. We choose the best tech stack for your specific needs and scale.

marketing_hooks: Your MVP in 4 weeks, not 6 months. AI-powered development for startups that can't wait.
Traditional agencies: 6+ months. Techinium: 4 weeks. Same quality, 3x faster delivery.
Stop burning runway on slow development. Get your MVP shipped in 4 weeks with AI acceleration.
From idea to paying customers in 5 weeks. See how AI-powered development changes everything.
Your competitors are still planning. You'll be shipping. 4-week MVP delivery for ambitious founders.
First-time founder? Skip the 6-month development nightmare. AI-powered MVPs in 4 weeks.

ab_tests.hypothesis: Longer headlines with specific benefits will convert better than short headlines for risk-averse founders who need reassurance.
Testimonials above the fold will increase trust and conversion rates compared to testimonials below pricing.
Showing 'Starting at $15K' vs exact pricing will reduce sticker shock and increase inquiry volume.
Risk-reducing CTAs like 'Get Free Strategy Call' will outperform action-focused CTAs like 'Start Your MVP'.
Leading with 'How We Work' will build more trust than leading with 'What You Get' for first-time founders.
